org.researchstack.backbone.storage.file

Class SimpleFileAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.researchstack.backbone.storage.file.SimpleFileAccess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileAccess

    public class SimpleFileAccess
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileAccess
    This class is a simple implementation of FileAccess that passes all data read/written through the encrypter for encryption/decryption. An encrypter such as UnencryptedProvider can be used to write unencrypted data instead.

    • Method Detail

      • writeData

        @WorkerThread
public void writeData(android.content.Context context,
                                    java.lang.String path,
                                    byte[] data)
        Description copied from interface: FileAccess
        Save data. Do not call this before you init or you'll get an exception. Also, networked storage has the high probability of network based exceptions. Use extra caution in those situations.
        Specified by:
        writeData in interface FileAccess
        Parameters:
        context - Can be Application context, but we'll be careful not to store, so don't worry too much.
        path - Path relative to the implementation's root store. Must start with '/'. No relative paths.
        data - Byte array. May implement streams in the future if all implementations support it.

      • readData

        @WorkerThread
public byte[] readData(android.content.Context context,
                                     java.lang.String path)
        Description copied from interface: FileAccess
        Read data. Do not call this before you init or you'll get an exception. Also, networked storage has the high probability of network based exceptions. Use extra caution in those situations. If the path does not exist, you'll get an exception, not a null. Just FYI. That may change.
        Specified by:
        readData in interface FileAccess
        Parameters:
        context - Can be Application context, but we'll be careful not to store, so don't worry too much.
        path - Path relative to the implementation's root store. Must start with '/'. No relative paths.

      • setEncrypter

        public void setEncrypter(Encrypter encrypter)
        Description copied from interface: FileAccess
        Set the encrypter. All data is passed through this object to be encrypted before save/decrypted after loading. For no encryption, use an encrypter that passes the data back unchanged.
        Specified by:
        setEncrypter in interface FileAccess
        Parameters:
        encrypter - Encrypter.
